attributes.action: Clean up Britain. Tougher laws on littering, vandalism and anti-social behavior
attributes.additional_details: Britain used to be a country of great pride, respect and beauty. Now, you can't walk 2 seconds without seeing a piece of litter, graffiti or people causing trouble. By toughening the laws on littering and anti-social behavior such as vandalism, then Britain can regain some of the respect it has lost
